DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: LYRA, R;Lyra, Ruy;Silva-Filho RL;Silva-Filho, Ruy;LYRA, R.;RUY LIRA;LIRA RUY;LIRA, RUY

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Professor de Endocrinologia da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Possui graduao em Medicina pela Universidade de Pernambuco (1985), Mestrado em Gentica pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2003) e Doutorado em Gentica pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2010). Tem experincia na rea de Medicina, especialista em Endocrinologia, atuando sobretudo nas reas de diabetes mellitus, obesidade, dislipidemia e risco cardiovascular, tendo diversas publicaes nessas reas. Tambm Tseu Felix Senior Research Fellow,do Harris Manchester College, University of Oxford, associado com o Tseu Medical Institute. Vem desenvolvendo livros e escrevendo diversos captulos na rea de Diabetes Mellitus. Atual Presidente da Sociedade Brasileira de Diabetes. Foi Presidente da Sociedade Brasileira de Endocrinologia e Metabologia (maro 2007- maro 2009) , Vice-Presidente da Federao Panamericana de Endocrinologia (FEPAEN) (maio 2009-abril 2012), Presidente da Federao Latinoamericana de Endocrinologia (FELAEN) (2012-2015), Vice-Presidente da Sociedade Brasileira de Diabetes (2014-2015) e Presidente Eleito da Sociedade Brasileira de Diabetes (2024-2025).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Professor of Endocrinology at the Federal University of Pernambuco. He holds a degree in Medicine from the University of Pernambuco (1985), a Master's in Genetics from the Federal University of Pernambuco (2003) and a PhD in Genetics from the Federal University of Pernambuco (2010). He has experience in the field of Medicine, specialist in Endocrinology, working mainly in the areas of diabetes mellitus, obesity, dyslipidemia and cardiovascular risk, having several publications in these areas. He is also a Senior Research Fellow at Harris Manchester College, Oxford University, associated with the Tseu Medical Institute. He has been developing books and writing several chapters in the area of Diabetes Mellitus. He was President of the Brazilian Society of Endocrinology and Metabology (March 2007-March 2009), Vice-President of the Panamerican Federation of Endocrinology (FEPAEN) (May 2009-April 2012), President of the Latin American Federation of Endocrinology (FELAEN) (2012-2015) , Vice-President of the Brazilian Society of Diabetes (2014-2015) and President-Elect of the Brazilian Society of Diabetes (2024-2025).
